text.autoconfig.smoothskies.title: Smooth Skies
text.autoconfig.smoothskies.option.dista: Set a custom view distance for the skybox fog. Higher numbers mean bluer skies.
text.autoconfig.smoothskies.option.lower: Lowers the required height for the sky to turn black to the world's lowest height. This prevents the sky turning black at a high Y value. Most noticeable in Skyblock-type worlds.
text.autoconfig.smoothskies.option.clear: Removes banding on the horizon, making the sky one uniform color.
